casebody.data:
May 15, 1967.

No. -.

Colacasides v. Michigan. Joseph W. Louisell and Ivan E. Ranis for applicant. Frank J. Kelley, Attorney General, and Robert A. Derengoski, Solicitor General, for the State of Michigan, in opposition.

Application for bail presented to Mr. Justice Stewart, and by him referred to the Court, denied.
